title: General
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

1 point per location. Both a Latin clause and a translation are required for each location. Minimal Latin bolded. Two possible answers: namque avia cursu dum sequor (for while I seek the pathless places in my haste); et nota excedo regione viarum (and I depart from the familiar district of the roads).
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

2 points maximum

1 point per location. Both a Latin clause and a translation are required for each location. Minimal Latin bolded. Two possible answers: namque avia cursu dum sequor (for while I seek the pathless places in my haste); et nota excedo regione viarum (and I depart from the familiar district of the roads).

Student response earns one of the available points.

2 points maximum

1 point per location. Both a Latin clause and a translation are required for each location. Minimal Latin bolded. Two possible answers: namque avia cursu dum sequor (for while I seek the pathless places in my haste); et nota excedo regione viarum (and I depart from the familiar district of the roads).

Student response earns two of the available points.
